title.rendered: Porting from iOS to Android: Where to Start

content.rendered:
Launched a successful product on iOS? Thinking of an Android app? Not sure where to start?

Let’s start with a consultation with our Android team! Out leading experts in Android UI/UX, design and engineering are open for a mobile consultancy to analyze your business goals, user needs and shape the vision of your future Android app.  We are happy to combine our experience in mobile design in engineering with your business values to create truly valuable mobile product for the users.

What’s more, we are ready to do the consultation for free!

Recently we did the porting of a Merriam-Webster Scrabble Dictionary app from iPhone and iPad to Android smartphone and tablets. As the set of features was already predefined, we focused on app’s interface. Using native components of Android OS, we went for smartphone and tablet applications that were usable and attractive – and we think our app came out awesome. Check out the results!

Get in touch to find out more about mobile apps porting!
